name: part_001
file: tmp_【チラ見せ枠・夜公演】AZKi Major Debut LiVE「声音エントロピー」【#AZKiワンマン #AZKiワンマン横浜夜】 [Sg8ijuHDcx0]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_001.mov

scenes.description: Promotional medley featuring snippets of the song 'Entropy' from AZKi's major 1st album 'Route If'. On-screen text displays song credits, tracklist, and album details.
Promotional medley featuring snippets of the song 'Mai to su te shi!' (Maitosu Teshi!) from the album 'Route If'. On-screen text highlights campaign information and limited edition bonuses.
Promotional medley featuring snippets of the song 'Lazy' from the album 'Route If'.
